name: 李泳霆
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.
schedule:
1) Introduction and Basic Concepts

2) Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis

3) Properties of Pure Substances

4) Energy Analysis of Closed Systems

5) Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes

6) The Second Law of Thermodynamics

7) Entropy

8) Exergy

9) Ｍidterm exam

10) Thermodynamic Property Relations (1)

11) Thermodynamic Property Relations (2)

12) Thermodynamic Property Relations (3)

13) Gas Mixtures

14) Gas-Vapor Mixtures and Air-Conditioning

15) Chemical Reactions

16) Chemical and Phase Equilibrium

17) Compressible Flow

18) Final exam
materials:
使用教材 (Textbook)：
「Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach」, 9th edition, Yunus Cengel, Michael A. Boles, Mehmet Kanoglu. ISBN：9789813157873, 2020, McGraw-Hill.

參考書目 (Reference)：
Fundamentals of thermodynamics, Borgnakkes Claus.
consultation: Office hour 時間歡迎至辦公室諮詢 email: ytl@ntut.edu.tw
